metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28362 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Go before 1.14.12 and 1.15.x before 1.15.4 allows Denial of Service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays.  vulnerable code introduced in 1.14

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
